name: Hyper Galactica
description:
Spaceships fights in galaxies

In 12 levels of game, your spaceship has to destroy, with your missiles, all the enemies coming from other galaxies before they invade our Planet. Watch out for their stealth spaceships, but also planets, black holes, asteroids, magnetic fields, stars, ... !

The aim is multiple: reach the level 12 with success but also overpass the reference scores of the game by reaching, at each level, the bonus.

This game can be played alone, with friends or with your family. You can choose your avatar among seven ones.

By setting the game, you can play it either with a gamepad (as XBOX,...) or a keyboard (AZERTY, QWERTY).

The game has an increasing difficulty and there is one galaxy per level of play.
